fields.name: controller
fields.desc: Controls the text being edited.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: Controls whether this widget has keyboard focus.

fields.name: obscuringCharacter
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.obscuringCharacter} Character used for obscuring text if [obscureText] is true.

fields.name: obscureText
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.obscureText} Whether to hide the text being edited (e.g., for passwords).

fields.name: textHeightBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro dart.ui.textHeightBehavior}

fields.name: textWidthBasis
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.painting.textPainter.textWidthBasis}

fields.name: readOnly
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.readOnly} Whether the text can be changed.

fields.name: forceLine
fields.desc: Whether the text will take the full width regardless of the text width.

fields.name: toolbarOptions
fields.desc: Configuration of toolbar options.

fields.name: showSelectionHandles
fields.desc: Whether to show selection handles.

fields.name: showCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.showCursor} Whether to show cursor.

fields.name: autocorrect
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.autocorrect} Whether to enable autocorrection.

fields.name: smartDashesType
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.services.TextInputConfiguration.smartDashesType}

fields.name: smartQuotesType
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.services.TextInputConfiguration.smartQuotesType}

fields.name: enableSuggestions
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.services.TextInputConfiguration.enableSuggestions}

fields.name: style
fields.desc: The text style to use for the editable text.

fields.name: undoController
fields.desc: Controls the undo state of the current editable text.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.textAlign} How the text should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: textDirection
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.textDirection} The directionality of the text.

fields.name: textCapitalization
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.textCapitalization} Configures how the platform keyboard will select an uppercase or lowercase keyboard.

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: Used to select a font when the same Unicode character can be rendered differently, depending on the locale.

fields.name: textScaleFactor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.textScaleFactor} Deprecated. Will be removed in a future version of Flutter. Use [textScaler] instead.

fields.name: textScaler
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.painting.textPainter.textScaler}

fields.name: cursorColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the cursor.

fields.name: autocorrectionTextRectColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the autocorrection Rect.

fields.name: backgroundCursorColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the background cursor aligned with the text while rendering the floating cursor.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.maxLines} The maximum number of lines to show at one time, wrapping if necessary.

fields.name: minLines
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.minLines} The minimum number of lines to occupy when the content spans fewer lines.

fields.name: expands
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.expands} Whether this widget's height will be sized to fill its parent.

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.autofocus} Whether this text field should focus itself if nothing else is already focused.

fields.name: selectionColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the selection.

fields.name: selectionControls
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.selectionControls} Optional delegate for building the text selection handles.

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.keyboardType} The type of keyboard to use for editing the text.

fields.name: textInputAction
fields.desc: The type of action button to use with the soft keyboard.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onChanged} Called when the user initiates a change to the TextField's value: when they have inserted or deleted text.

fields.name: onEditingComplete
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onEditingComplete} Called when the user submits editable content (e.g., user presses the "done" button on the keyboard).

fields.name: onSubmitted
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onSubmitted} Called when the user indicates that they are done editing the text in the field.

fields.name: onAppPrivateCommand
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onAppPrivateCommand} This is used to receive a private command from the input method.

fields.name: onSelectionChanged
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onSelectionChanged} Called when the user changes the selection of text (including the cursor location). {@endtemplate}

fields.name: onSelectionHandleTapped
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.SelectionOverlay.onSelectionHandleTapped}

fields.name: groupId
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.groupId} The group identifier for the [TextFieldTapRegion] of this text field.

fields.name: onTapOutside
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onTapOutside} Called for each tap down that occurs outside of the [TextFieldTapRegion] group when the text field is focused.

fields.name: onTapUpOutside
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.onTapUpOutside} Called for each tap up that occurs outside of the [TextFieldTapRegion] group when the text field is focused.

fields.name: inputFormatters
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.inputFormatters} Optional input validation and formatting overrides.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: rendererIgnoresPointer
fields.desc: Whether the caller will provide gesture handling (true), or if the [EditableText] is expected to handle basic gestures (false).

fields.name: cursorWidth
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.cursorWidth} How thick the cursor will be.

fields.name: cursorHeight
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.cursorHeight} How tall the cursor will be.

fields.name: cursorRadius
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.cursorRadius} How rounded the corners of the cursor should be.

fields.name: cursorOpacityAnimates
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.cursorOpacityAnimates} Whether the cursor will animate from fully transparent to fully opaque during each cursor blink.

fields.name: cursorOffset
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.rendering.RenderEditable.cursorOffset}

fields.name: paintCursorAboveText
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.rendering.RenderEditable.paintCursorAboveText}

fields.name: selectionHeightStyle
fields.desc: Controls how tall the selection highlight boxes are computed to be.

fields.name: selectionWidthStyle
fields.desc: Controls how wide the selection highlight boxes are computed to be.

fields.name: keyboardAppearance
fields.desc: The appearance of the keyboard.

fields.name: scrollPadding
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.scrollPadding} Configures the padding for the edges surrounding a [Scrollable] when the text field scrolls into view.

fields.name: enableInteractiveSelection
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.enableInteractiveSelection} Whether to enable user interface affordances for changing the text selection.

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.scrollable.dragStartBehavior}

fields.name: scrollController
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.scrollController} The [ScrollController] to use when vertically scrolling the input.

fields.name: scrollPhysics
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.scrollPhysics} The [ScrollPhysics] to use when vertically scrolling the input.

fields.name: scribbleEnabled
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.scribbleEnabled} Whether iOS 14 Scribble features are enabled for this widget.

fields.name: stylusHandwritingEnabled
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.stylusHandwritingEnabled} Whether this input supports stylus handwriting, where the user can write directly on top of a field.

fields.name: autofillHints
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.autofillHints} A list of strings that helps the autofill service identify the type of this text input.

fields.name: autofillClient
fields.desc: The [AutofillClient] that controls this input field's autofill behavior.

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: restorationId
fields.desc: Restoration ID to save and restore the scroll offset of the [EditableText].

fields.name: scrollBehavior
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.scrollBehavior} A [ScrollBehavior] that will be applied to this widget individually.

fields.name: enableIMEPersonalizedLearning
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.services.TextInputConfiguration.enableIMEPersonalizedLearning}

fields.name: contentInsertionConfiguration
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.editableText.contentInsertionConfiguration} Configuration of handler for media content inserted via the system input method.

fields.name: contextMenuBuilder
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.EditableText.contextMenuBuilder} Builds the text selection toolbar when requested by the user.

fields.name: spellCheckConfiguration
fields.desc: {@template flutter.widgets.EditableText.spellCheckConfiguration} Configuration that details how spell check should be performed.

fields.name: magnifierConfiguration
fields.desc: The configuration for the magnifier to use with selections in this text field.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of EditableText
desc: The above five are the essential properties of EditableText. Others are the same as TextField and will not be listed here.
